1) State of Assam
    Advocate - Md. Abul Kalam

acts.act: Protection of Children From Sexual Offences Act

business_details.Business: Judgment delivered. Accused Md. Jahir Hussain is convicted and sentenced to undergo RI for 5 years and to pay fine of Rs. 5000 in default SI for 3 months for his conviction under sections 376/511 IPC RW Sections 10/12 of POCSO Act.
